title: New: Bibio – À tout à l’heure
content:
After the disappointment that was Mind Bokeh, Bibio is set to release his 7th studio record in the form of Silver Wilkinson.

Now distinctly a pop musician, he may have lost some of the landscape elements of his music that made early albums like FI so spellbinding, despite this what’s important to remember is Bibio sure can knock out a belta pop tune; À tout à l’heure is no exception.

Silver Wilkinson with release via warp on 14 May.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
